articles.title: Iconic Kinetic Luna to return as e-moped in Feb: Bookings begin on Republic Day - IndiaTimes
articles.description: Electric Bike News: The iconic Kinetic Luna is making a comeback as an e-moped in February 2024. Bookings for the e-Luna will start on Republic Day with a nominal token amount of Rs 500. Reserve your e-Luna on the company’s website.
